name: Apocalypse Overload - Zombies Ninjas Robots Pirates & You!
blurb: High adrenaline end of the world retro platformer. Featuring Zombies, Ninjas, Robots, Pirates, Aliens, and your designs!

rewards.reward: USER\r\n==============================\r\nDigital copy of Apocalypse Overload + Backer only in-game items
PLAYER\r\n==============================\r\nYour name immortalized in the game credits + Digital copy of Apocalypse Overload + Backer only in-game items
TESTER\r\n==============================\r\nEarly Beta Access + Your name immortalized in the game credits + Digital copy of Apocalypse Overload + Backer only in-game items

Digital Collector's Edition\r\n==============================\r\nDigital Collector's only in-game items + Digital Comic Book (PDF) + Digital Art Book (PDF) + Digital Poster (JPG) + Early Beta Access + Your name immortalized in the game credits + Digital copy of Apocalypse Overload + Backer only in-game items

OBSTACLE DESIGNER
==============================
Create an Obstacle! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for an obstacle, choose from 3 types, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game!
==============================
Create an Obstacle + Digital Collector's Tier

IN-GAME APPEARANCE
==============================
Appear in-game as an Non Playable Character! Choose from 3 NPC types, various facial details, hair styles, clothing, and colors and we'll do the programming to get you in the game!
==============================
In-Game Appearance + Digital Collector's Tier

ENEMY DESIGNER
==============================
Create an Enemy! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for an enemy, choose from 4 types, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game!
==============================
Enemy Designer + Digital Collector's Tier

POTION DESIGNER
==============================
Create a Potion! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for a potion, choose from an several types, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game!
==============================
Potion Designer + Digital Collector's Tier

ABILITY DESIGNER
==============================
Create an Ability! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for an ability, many attributes to choose from, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game!
==============================
Ability Designer + Digital Collector's Tier

BOSS DESIGNER
==============================
Create a Boss! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for a boss, many attributes to choose from, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game!
==============================
Boss Designer + Digital Collector's Tier

Collector's Survival Kit
==============================
Collector's Survival Kit backer only in-game items + Apocalypse Overload backer T-shirt + Apocalypse Overload Coffee Mug + Digital Comic Book (PDF) + Apocalypse Overload iPad & iPhone snap cases + Apocalypse Overload Mouse Pad + Printed Comic Book + Printed Art Book + Printed Poster + Digital copy of Apocalypse Overload
==============================
Collector's Survival Kit + Digital Collector's Tier

CLASS DESIGNER
==============================
Create a Character Class! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for a character class, many attributes to choose from, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game! You'll receive exclusive access to in-game potions of this Class so you can play it anytime.
==============================
Class Designer + Collector's Survival Kit Tier

LEVEL DESIGNER
==============================
Create a playable level theme & new area on the map! Supply us with your exciting idea & inspiration for a level theme, and we'll do the art and programming to get it in the game! You'll have exclusive access to this area at launch.
==============================
Level Designer + Collector's Survival Kit Tier

GAME ENDER
==============================
Help write the climatic ending that the game launches with + Receive Primer Game Credit on the Game Loading Screen + Exclusive In-game Credits 
==============================
Ender Game + Collector's Survival Kit Tier
